natural_language_question: Which papers did the author Gennady L. Andrienko write?
Which publications did Maia Rohm author?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX orcid: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE { ?answer orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5108-6874"; a ?type. ?publication ?relation ?answer. FILTER(?relation IN (https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship, https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthor)) }

natural_language_question: What are the papers written by the person A. V. Thakur?

natural_language_question: Which publications did W. Wu author?
Which papers did Richard Bowden publish in the last eight years?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX orcid: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE { ?answer fabio:hasPublicationYear ?y . ?answer orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3285-8020" . FILTER(?y > (YEAR(NOW()) - 8)) }

natural_language_question: List the papers published by Neil McGlohon in the last 5 years.
sparql_query_kg2: SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE { ?answer <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasPublication> ?pub . ?pub <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8304-4911> . ?pub <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/hasPublicationYear> ?y FILTER(?y > YEAR(NOW())-5) UNION ?answer <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthor> <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8304-4911> . ?answer <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/hasPublicationYear> ?y FILTER(?y > YEAR(NOW())-5) }

natural_language_question: Which papers did Olga Veksler publish in the last four years?

natural_language_question: In which conferences or journals has Elly A. Konijn published papers?

FILTER(?answer != <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8433-159X>) } UNION { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthor> ?answer . ?answer <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8433-159X" . ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthor> <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8433-159X> . natural_language_question: Which publications did Srinivas Katkoori author and in which year?

FILTER (?author = <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1933-0504>) }

natural_language_question: List the venues in which Mohammad Reza Aref published papers and the titles of these papers.

FILTER (?y > YEAR(NOW())-9). ?x <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> ?firstanswer. UNION ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasSource> ?secondanswer. UNION ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasLocation> ?secondanswer. }

FILTER(?y > YEAR(NOW())-7) . { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasLocation> ?firstanswer . } UNION { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasSource> ?firstanswer . } ?x <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> ?secondanswer . }

OPTIONAL { ?work semoa:hasAuthor orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6486-7477" } . FILTER (BOUND(?work)) }

FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5510-1616> . } UNION ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5510-1616> . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5049-3577> . } }

UNION ?dblp <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#authoredBy> <https://dblp.org/pid/u/MichaelUnser>. ?answer oa:hasAuthorship ?dblp. }

natural_language_question: Report the average number of publications by P. Melin per year.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> PREFIX semopenalex: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?author semopenalex:authorOrcid <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5798-1426> . ?x semopenalex:hasAuthor ?author . ?x semopenalex:hasAuthorship ?a . ?a semopenalex:hasAuthor ?author . ?x semopenalex:publicationYear ?y . ?x semopenalex:hasPublicationYear ?y . GROUP BY ?y }

natural_language_question: Report the average number of publications by Bottino, R. Maria per year.
sparql_query_kg2: SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6709-0053> . ?x <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/hasPublicationYear> ?y } GROUP BY ?y }

natural_language_question: Report the average number of publications by Kian Hsiang Low per year.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> PREFIX semopenalex: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { ?x semopenalex:hasAuthor <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2808-451X> . ?x semopenalex:hasPublicationYear ?year . ?x semopenalex:hasAuthorship ?y . FILTER (?y = ?x) GROUP BY ?year }

natural_language_question: Report the average number of publications by S. Yun per year.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> PREFIX semopenalex: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX orcid: <https://orcid.org/> PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?x <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#authoredBy> <https://dblp.org/pid/23/8862> . ?x <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#yearOfPublication> ?y . SERVICE <http://dbpedia.org/sparql> { ?author dbo:orcid ?orcid . FILTER(?orcid = orcid:"0000-0001-6675-5113") } SERVICE semopenalex { ?x semopenalex:hasAuthorship ?author . ?author semopenalex:hasPublicationYear ?y . BIND(COUNT(?y) AS ?count) } } GROUP BY ?y

natural_language_question: What is the average number of research papers published by the author Ramayah, T. per year?
sparql_query_kg2: SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-7580-7058> . ?x <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/hasPublicationYear> ?y } GROUP BY ?y }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of papers published by Utpal Garain per year?

natural_language_question: Report the average number of publications by Alexandra Branzan Albu per year.

FILTER(?coAuthor != orcid:https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6114-1411) }

FILTER(?author != ?authorshipAuthor) FILTER(?author != "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0492-0886") }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by E. G. Omodeo?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX orcid: <https://orcid.org/> PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?x oa:hasAuthorship ?y . ?y orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3917-1942" . OPTIONAL { ?y oa:hasAuthorship ?z } . BIND(IF(?z, COUNT(DISTINCT ?z), 0) AS ?count) }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by Michael Vynnycky?

sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX orcid: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x oa:hasAuthorship ?y ; orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3560-4288" . ?x oa:hasAuthor ?z . } GROUP BY ?z }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by P. R. S. Mendon\u00E7a?

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for research papers published by Gustaf S\u00F6derlind?
sparql_query_kg2: SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthor> ?author . ?x <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X> ; <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> ?y . FILTER(?author = <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> || ?author = <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X> ) . BIND((COUNT(DISTINCT ?y) as ?count)) }

natural_language_question: List the titles of the papers that Nikolay M. Safyannikov published and in which venues.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX orcid: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX hasAuthorship: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasAuthorship> PREFIX hasSource: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/hasSource> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT ?title ?venue WHERE { ?x orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5424-0881" . ?x hasAuthorship ?y . ?y hasSource ?venue . ?y dc:title ?title . }

natural_language_question: Which papers did author Gerard J. M. Janssen publish and in which year?
